channel.title: AI on EMBA BEYOND
channel.description: Recent content in AI on EMBA BEYOND

item.title: AI supported firmware analysis
item.description: EMBA - The AI powered firmware security analyzer Why not use AI for firmware analysis? This is the idea we had since the public release of OpenAI’s GPT-3 and GPT-4 earlier this year. We started testing OpenAI’s ChatGPT for different possible usage scenarios like the integration of further CVE explanation: Additionally, we thought about a quick lookup for potential exploit code or POCâ€™s: It can be seen that the available information is quite limited because of the limited dataset for these types of requests.
